name.ja: <ruby>蛇眼の炎燐<rt>スネークアイズ・ポプルス</rt></ruby>

text.en: If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can Special Summon it. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Snake-Eye" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 FIRE monster in your GY; place it face-up in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell. You can only use each effect of "Snake-Eyes Populus" once per turn.
